website_summaries.verdict: Silicon Power's microSDHC card is a good option for users with older devices that are not compatible with newer SDXC cards.
pros: For users who love their older cameras and other recording devices that are still in good working condition, storage can be tricky because many of those devices are not compatible with today's microSDXC cards
For those users, a microSDHC is the right choice, and Silicon Power's microSDHC is reliable and durable
It is compatible with many camcorders and smartphones with SDHC slots
Can be used to boost the storage capacity of some handheld gaming devices, including Nintendo Switch
cons: Because of a lower write speed and storage capacity, this card may not be a good option for newer devices with 4K video resolution

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend it. If anything changes I will update
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this card to replace the SanDisk high endurance card (A) that failed after about 2 weeks. This card has been use for about 2 months and it performs flawlessly in a dash cam. I would highly recommend it. If anything changes I will update.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer X

customer_reviews.title: its Decent, but not for long term...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 10 to 12 months... ( used for dash cams in 3 different vehicles) but what would one expect for a product at this price...
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Died on second day in my car dashcam
customer_reviews.text: Used in my car dashcam. Died on second day and no longer readable from dashcam or other computers & microsd readers. I replaced with a Samsung microsd card and it has been working great for a few weeks now. I need to figure how to make use of the warranty return.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppr

customer_reviews.title: Normal card was only good for a few month and started to give error ...
customer_reviews.text: Did fixed issues with my car DVR. Normal card was only good for a few month and started to give error messages. This one is working for more than 6 month without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Abekir

customer_reviews.title: Memory Error
customer_reviews.text: In my Rexing V1LG I keep getting "memory card error" buy SanDisk or transcend. Steer clear of this one. I'm returning the SP.
customer_reviews.author: Debra B. Gotelli

customer_reviews.title: Broke down after 5 weeks of using it
customer_reviews.text: After 5 weeks of using it this happens.... Not a reliable brand after all. First time I tried this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: The card works great, and performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The card works great, and performs as advertised. Sadly, many older SD card slots are not up to the task, in which case the performance will not be any better than ordinary SDHC cards — but that's not the product's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Mal-2

customer_reviews.title: What a way to save your memories
customer_reviews.text: What a way to expand your android phone or tablet. It came with an adapter for use in my laptop as well so you can rest assured it will probably work in any device where removable storage is required.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Not enough time to know about the "high endurance" part.
customer_reviews.author: Camilo Mustelier

customer_reviews.title: Great product durability and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product will definitely buy it again.a bit prices but worthy
customer_reviews.author: SHAQ

customer_reviews.title: Reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Have two of these. Works great on two cars dash cams.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Submerged in Salt Water
customer_reviews.text: Great SD card. I swam in the ocean, and then in a pool for several hours only to realize my smart phone was in my pocket. The phone was toast, but I retrieved all the data off this card.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my aukey dash cam. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Corneliu O.

customer_reviews.title: This is my 3rd SD Card that I bought for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd SD Card that I bought for my dash cam reformatted it and is still not registering in my dash cam
customer_reviews.author: Josh Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the value
customer_reviews.text: As a semi Professional Photographer i found this memory card to be reliable. Priced right and Amazon got it to me in good time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Good product for a very good price. I use two of them in a Nikon D7100 DSLR camera. It uploads and downloads images quickly.
customer_reviews.author: P. Zierhut

customer_reviews.title: card has failed in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: my dash cam constantly tells me that the card needs to be formatted. So i decided to use it on an old smartphone and sure enough a week later i get the dreaded micro sd card not found message.
customer_reviews.author: Hyrules Hero

customer_reviews.title: Better Than SanDisk For The Price
customer_reviews.text: The card works as advertised. I can't tell the difference between this card and mywhen shooting with my Canon T3i. Best card for the price. I was supplied a sample for the purpose of review.
customer_reviews.author: Deon

customer_reviews.title: no problem in my Wii
customer_reviews.text: got it for my Wii game. Popped it in, works fine to download more games. Great for the price, why pay more.
customer_reviews.author: T.Swift

product_meta.title: Silicon Power 32GB MicroSDHC UHS-1 Memory Card - with Adapter (SP032GBSTHBU1V20UR)
product_meta.description: Capacity:32GB| Style:Classic EditionCapture More with the Fast Speed The Elite Series memory cards feature the UHS-1 specifications that enable fast transfer speeds to save you more time when moving data from your card to other devices. Also, it supports Full-HD video recording so that you can capture HD videos without annoying lags and dropouts. *To reach the maximum read/write speed, a UHS-I enabled and USB 3.0 reader or host device would be recommended. Ideal for Up-to-date Gadgets Equipped with the Class 10 speed, the Elite microSD series can bring high-tech gears into full play! You may also place it in some portable speakers for more appealing music. Waterproof, Shockproof, Temperature-proof and X-ray proof Even if you are doing outdoor activities in some extreme climate conditions, the Elite series can still survive from water, shock and wide-temperatures storage ranging from -40ºC to 85ºC! Moreover, the Elite series is immune to airport X-rays so there is no need to worry when travelling overseas. Add More Storage for Your Mobile Devices Hard to choose which one to delete? The Elite microSD series is available from 16GB to 128GB so you can instantly free up the storage of your mobile devices. Take 64GB as an example, it allows you to keep massive mobile Apps, up to 850 minutes videos, 16,000 songs and 24,000 photos! Lifetime Warranty The Elite microSD Series is backed by lifetime warranty. *Please register your product via SP official website to get complete manufacturer warranty services, product support and more. Box Contains 1 x Silicon Power Elite microSD Card 1 x SD Adapter. Operating Temperature 0 Degrees Celsius ~ 70 Degrees Celsius and Storage Temperature ─40 Degrees Celsius ~ 85 Degrees Celsius .
feature_bullets: UHS-1 Class 10 specifications, enabling fast file transfer speeds and Full-HD video recording.
High compatibility for different types of devices including smartphones, tablets, DSLR and HD camcorder.
Come with a SD card adapter that enables versatile usages for any SD enabled devices.
Lifetime warranty. (Please register your product via SP official website to get the complete manufacturer warranty services, product support and more.)
